template.template: Template UBNT UniFi Controller v5 - active checks
template.name: Template UBNT UniFi Controller v5 - active checks
template.description:
Template for UBNT UniFi Controller by zbx.sadman@gmail.com
Tested with controller v5.x, Zabbix v 2.4.
https://github.com/zbx-sadman/unifi_proxy
Requirements: UniFi Proxy / UniFi Miner >= v1.3.7&
aptitude install libjson-perl libjson-xs-perl libwww-perl libio-socket-ssl-perl libdata-dumper-simple-perl libtime-hires-perl
aptitude bring a-lot-of-beer

item_prototype.name: [{#SITEDESC}] WLAN "{#NAME}" UAPSD enabled
item_prototype.description: UAPSD is an acronym for Unscheduled Automatic Power Save Delivery, a feature of Wi-Fi devices that allows them to save power. UAPSD is also known as WMM power save.
